Title: Provides that the fines for traffic infractions and traffic misdemeanors committed in a school traffic control zone are doubled
Summary: Provides that the fines for traffic infractions and traffic misdemeanors committed in a school traffic control zone are doubled; requires such zones to be marked by a traffic light or stop sign.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to doubling the fines for traffic infractions and traffic misdemeanors committed in school traffic control zones
